title: Social Constructivist-Based Language Learning Design in the Digital Transformation Era

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and basic concepts in elementary language education
context.additional_context: Focuses on supporting teachers' uncertainty during digital transformation by combining social constructivism and agile methodologies, providing iterative design improvement experiences through learner collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can explain a language lesson design process applying social constructivist principles in digital environments in three or more stages
Learners can operate weekly feedback cycles based on an agile mindset to improve project deliverables
Learners can produce at least two types of digital lesson materials incorporating peer feedback using collaboration tools in an LMS
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
